name: Ms. Terwillinger's Ring
description:
Designer 

Henry Klotz

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Fall 2017

Engine
Unity

Genre
Discovery Puzzle

Description
Barrow, Alaska — the coldest city in the state. You find yourself sneaking into Bear River Middle School, which had been abandoned many years ago. It has been rumored that the body of Ms. Terwilliger, a sixth grade English teacher, lay somewhere in the school. She was known to have worn a ring adorned with a diamond worth millions of dollars. A difficult opportunity to pass up.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
